title: Gift or sale of county property for care of aged
context: ยง46-63 Gift or sale of county property for care of aged persons. The several counties may give, sell, set aside, and transfer property, real or personal, to private eleemosynary organizations dedicated to the care of aged persons, so long as it is used for the care of aged persons. [L 1963, c 122, ยง1; Supp, ยง138-53; HRS ยง46-63]
